## CCSelectorState.phoneNumStr property

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

The whole phone number including the country code as a string. This is the value of the phone number input element.

**Signature:**

```typescript
phoneNumStr: string;
```
